## ReadableEthers class

Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableProtocol](./lib-base.readableprotocol.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ReadableEthers implements ReadableProtocol 
```
**Implements:** [ReadableProtocol](./lib-base.readableprotocol.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ReadableEthers` class.
